message: Let's be reasonable, I'll give you a better deal than last round.
This is getting ridiculous, take this offer before inflation eats up all the profit!
You're losing value, I'm being generous!
Time is money Alice, literally! I'm being serious, let's close this deal.
Your share is melting, accept now!
This is my final offer Alice, take it or leave it. The clock is ticking!
Don't be stubborn, your share is almost worthless!
